definitions.definition: A professional who designs buildings or other structures, or who prepares plans and superintends construction.
definitions.example: Plato made the causes of things to be matter, ideas, and an efficient architect.

definitions.definition: A person who plans, devises or contrives the achievement of a desired result.
definitions.example: Peisistratus was the first architect of the Iliad and the Odyssey.

definitions.definition: A title given to architects. Usually capitalized or abbreviated as Arch./Ar. before the person's name.

definitions.example: He architected the military coup against the government.
